about: I am a very determined, hardworking individual with an ability to solve problems and a skill to work with numbers obtained through a range of courses I had taken throughout the years. I am an alumnus of the Leaders' Quest programme offered by Life Choices, a part-time tutor at the IKamva Youth programme and currently enrolled to Life Choices Coding Academy for 12 months. As a result, I have been equipped with valuable experience in organising paperwork, administrating, leading, solving complex problems and mostly working with people through being a good communicator and a volunteer.My fascination with technology increased after I completed an information systems mandatory course at University of Cape Town.Through this, I am interested in enhancing my experience and skills professionally by securing a position in the service/tech industry..

education.detail: Matric exemption - Bachelor passes with 3 distinctions in Economics, Business Studies and Life Orientation.Top 10 of the best Business Studies and Economics Students in the Western Cape Province.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.experience: I have  experience in web development using the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. I am still building applications using the mentioned technologies.

skills.title: Leadership
skills.experience: I have completed a 2 year programme at Life Choice's Leaders' Quest, that has been carrying me since high school. I have empeeccable leadesrship skills that I have utilized and has enhanced and helped me achieve excellency in work I have done. Public speaking , work etiquette, story telling and team work and development are skills which I had obtained through the programme

skills.title: Tutoring
skills.experience: One of my goals is to become a proffesor for something I specialize in , I have been a tutor since high school in commercial subjects and through IKamva Youth programme, I have been awarded with excellency and appreaciation of the impact I have on our yout and community

projects.name: To-do List
projects.description: I built this application using HTML 5, CSS, and Javascript.

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: This is my calculator app, and I built it using HTML 5, CSS 3, Javascript, and Bootstrap's icon. In order to validate my input element, I make use of regular expressions.

projects.name: NZK Portfolio
projects.description: I built my portfolio using HTML 5, CSS, Bootstrap.
